trans-unit.source: The source of the event, typically an application settings wrapper class derived from the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento, normalmente uma classe wrapper de configurações de aplicativo derivada da classe <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs" /> containing the data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de <see cref="E:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging> event occurs before the value of an application settings property is changed, typically through a call to the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Item%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging> evento ocorre antes do valor de uma propriedade de configurações do aplicativo é alterado, normalmente por meio de uma chamada para o <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Item%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging> can be canceled through the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs> event data class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging> pode ser cancelado por meio de <xref:System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs> classe de dados de evento.
